page.title: 08YOUTH AND COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: In the centre of{High Valleyfield}is the Youth and Community Centre. It was built in 1975. The manager is Mr. George Hunter.He has an assistant manager and a clerkess.There are{ten {part time leaders and five voluntary {leaders.}In the centre there is a wide variety of activities for people of all ages to do. An example of Tuesday's timetable is shown on the next page. The Centre has a{full {size snooker table and an all purpose {games hall, used for football, {badminton,hockey, netball and {basketball.}There is a cafe,for community use. This is also used to serve lunches to{Senior {Citizens. {Outdoor activities}are organised. Using the Centre minibus trips are arranged to go canoeing,ice-skating hill walking or camping.
